page.title: 07SOCIAL CONCERNS SCRAPTOFT
page.content: Some foxes appear to be changing their way of life.Some residents are encouraging these animals by putting out scraps for them.These urban foxes can be seen regularly between dusk and dawn crossing gardens in search of food. Another matter causing concern in the area is vandalism.Unfortunately there is far too much.Schools,youth clubs and community centres seem to bear the brunt of such attacks,which is surprising as the vandals who have been caught are of school age or have just left school.Premises have been broken into,windows smashed and property stolen.This week we heard that the police had caught the culprits responsible for damaging our school.
